markdownRemark.excerpt:
While the front door of the intellect is slammed shut, art sneaks through the backdoor of the imagination.
— Ian Cron quoted by Stephen Proctor, ALT Podcast…
markdownRemark.html: While the front door of the intellect is slammed shut, art sneaks through the backdoor of the imagination. — Ian Cron quoted by Stephen Proctor, ALT Podcast, episode 2
